description: This file defines API route handlers for authentication functionalities in a FastAPI application, including login, logout, fetching current user info, and token verification.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: Data model for login request payload.

classes.name: LoginResponse
classes.description: Data model for login response payload.

classes.name: EmployeeResponse
classes.description: Data model representing employee user data.

classes.name: ActionType
classes.description: Enumeration of user actions for logging purposes.

methods.name: login(login_data: LoginRequest)
methods.description: Handles user authentication and returns an access token upon success.

methods.name: logout(current_user = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Logs out the current user by creating an audit entry; token invalidation is client-side.

methods.name: get_current_user_info(current_user = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Returns information about the currently authenticated user.

methods.name: verify_token(current_user = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Checks if the provided token is valid and returns user info.
